name: src/lens.mjs
LensComponent
todo: Mention in README that this module expects VYLO to be a global variable.

name: MAX_DISPLAY
description: The max display an instance can be displayed at.

name: MAX_DELTA_TIME
description: The max amount of delta time between ticks. If this limit is passed, it will be clamped to this value.

name: DEFAULT_TILE_SIZE
description: The default tile size of the Vylocity Game Engine.

name: AXIS
description: An array of axis.

name: version
description: The version of the module.

name: validEase
description: An array of valid ease names.

name: camera
description: The camera that lens controls.

name: initialized
description: Whether the camera has been created and is ready for use or not.

name: attached
description: Whether the camera is attached to something and will follow it.

name: custom
description: If this camera is using custom settings currently.

name: following
description: The current instance this camera is following.

name: oldFollowingPos
description: The old position that the camera was following in the last tick.

name: settings
description: The settings this camera uses to operate.

name: instanceWeakMap
description: Weakmap to track data belonging to instances used in this module.

name: mapViewInitialized
description: Whether the mapview has been initialized.

name: updateWithCamera
description: A callback to be called when the camera is updated.

params.description: pDiffX - The difference in position between the camera's old x position and it's new position.
pDiffY - The difference in position between the camera's old y position and it's new position.

name: logger
description: The logger module this module uses to log errors / logs.

name: initCamera
description: Builds and initiates the camera and assigns some presets to it

name: getTrueCenterPos
description: Returns the true center position by using the x and y position and adding half of the icon's width / height. If no icon is found, we instead use the half of the default tileSize.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} Object containing the true center position of the instance.

params.name: pInstance
params.description: The instance to get the true center position of.

return.description: Object containing the true center position of the instance.

name: reset
description: Resets the camera based on the method passed.

params.name: pMethod
params.description: The method to reset.

name: zoomUpdate
description: The method to update the zoom when it is active.

params.name: pElapsedMS
params.description: The amount of ms that has passed since the last tick.

params.name: pDeltaTime
params.description: The delta time between ticks.

name: shakeUpdate
description: The method to update shaking when it is active.

params.name: pElapsedMS
params.description: The amount of ms that has passed since the last tick.

params.name: pDeltaTime
params.description: The delta time between ticks.

name: pan
description: Pans the camera from one view to another view. This pan can be customized in both axis. This pan has callbacks and settings that allow further customization.

params.name: pSettings
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.target
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.ease
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.ease.x
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.ease.y
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.panBackEase
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.panBackEase.x
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.panBackEase.y
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.duration
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.duration.x
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.duration.y
params.description: A Object holding settings that control this pan.

params.name: pSettings.panBackDuration
params.description: A Object holding settings that control the duration of the pan.

params.name: pSettings.panBackDuration.x
params.description: The duration of the ease in the x dimension.

params.name: pSettings.panBackDuration.y
params.description: The duration of the ease in the y dimension.

params.name: pSettings.pauseDuration
params.description: How long the camera will stay at the target after panning to it before completing the pan.

params.name: pSettings.attach
params.description: Whether or not to attach the camera to the target when the pan to it is completed. This automatically forfeits the panBack nature of this and no panBack callback will be called.

params.name: pSettings.forceDirChange
params.description: Whether panning to a target changes your direction to face the target.

params.name: pSettings.panToCallback
params.description: Callback function to be called when the pan to the target is completed.

params.name: pSettings.panBackCallback
params.description: Callback function to be called when the pan from the target back to the camera's target is completed.

name: onPanned
description: Event handler for when the first part of the pan completes.

name: onPanFinish
description: Event handler for when the second part of the pan completes.

name: followLogic
description: The logic for following instances via the camera.

params.name: pAxis
params.description: 'x' | 'y'. The axis to handle the logic in.

params.name: pPosition
params.description: The centered position of the target.

params.name: pMethod
params.description: The method the camera is using to follow.

params.name: pElapsedMS
params.description: The elapsed time since the last tick.

params.name: pSettings
params.description: The method's settings object.

name: follow
description: Method to follow the target of the camera.

params.name: pMethod
params.description: The method in which the camera is following.

params.name: pElapsedMS
params.description: The amount of ms that has passed since the last tick.

name: update
description: Update handler that is called each tick to update the camera's state

params.name: pElapsedMS
params.description: The amount of ms that has passed since the last tick

params.name: pDeltaTime
params.description: The delta time between ticks.

name: zoom
description: Zooms the camera in via the passed in arguments.

params.name: pDestinationLevel
params.description: An object containing the zoom level information.

params.name: pDestinationLevel.x
params.description: The x scale to zoom to.

params.name: pDestinationLevel.y
params.description: The y scale to zoom to.

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the zoom.

params.name: pEase
params.description: An object containing the ease information for how the zoom will be performed.

params.name: pEase.x
params.description: The ease to use for the x scale zooming.

params.name: pEase.y
params.description: The ease to use for the y scale zooming.

params.name: pCallback
params.description: The callback to call after the zoom ends.

name: setSettings
description: Sets the camera to operate using these user defined settings.

params.name: pSettings
params.description: An object that holds settings for how the canera will behave.

params.name: pSettings.duration
params.description: An object that holds settings for how the canera will behave.

params.name: pSettings.duration.x
params.description: The duration of the ease in the x dimension.

params.name: pSettings.duration.y
params.description: The duration of the ease in the y dimension.

params.name: pSettings.ease
params.description: An object that holds settings for how the canera will behave.

params.name: pSettings.ease.x
params.description: The ease to use in the x dimension.

params.name: pSettings.ease.y
params.description: The ease to use in the y dimension.

name: spectate
description: Spectates another instance with the camera using the passed settings. If the location is over 1000m(pixels) away then the camera will automatically jump to that position no matter if `forcePos` is toggled or not.
todo: Allow pSettings.target to also be a coordinate position, this will send the camera to that space and spectate that position.

params.name: pSettings
params.description: Settings to control the spectate

params.name: pSettings.target
params.description: The instance to spectate

params.name: pSettings.forcePos
params.description: If the camera should spectate instantly without easing to the location.

name: cancelSpectate
description:
Stops spectating. 
If the setting 'forcePos' was set. Then the camera will immedietly jump to the original camera target.

name: attach
description: Attaches the camera to the passed instance.

params.name: pInstance
params.description: The instance to attach the camera to

params.name: pSettings
params.description: An object that holds settings for how the canera will behave.

params.name: pSettings.duration
params.description: An object that holds settings for how the canera will behave.

params.name: pSettings.duration.x
params.description: The duration of the ease in the x dimension.

params.name: pSettings.duration.y
params.description: The duration of the ease in the y dimension.

params.name: pSettings.ease
params.description: An object that holds settings for how the canera will behave.

params.name: pSettings.ease.x
params.description: The ease to use in the x dimension.

params.name: pSettings.ease.y
params.description: The ease to use in the y dimension.

params.name: pUpdateFunc
params.description: A callback that will be called when the camera is updated. pDiffX and pDiffY params are the difference in position between the last tick.

name: detach
description: Detaches the camera. The camera is no longer the view eye.

name: shake
description: Shakes the camera with the passed settings.

params.name: pIntensity
params.description: The intensity of the shaking effect. 0 - 100

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the shaking effect in ms.

params.name: pRotational
params.description: Whether the shaking consists of rotational shaking as well.

params.name: pCallback
params.description: Callback function to call when the shaking is completed.

name: isShaking
description: Check if the camera is currently shaking.

name: isSpectating
description: Check if the camera is currently spectating.

name: isZooming
description: Check if the camera is currently zooming.

name: isPanning
description: Check if the camera is currently panning.

name: isMoving
description: Check if the camera is currently moving.

content:
# Lens Module  
A powerful module that will allow you to attach a camera to your player and use its rich API for some cool effects.

## Installation

### ES Module

```js
import { Lens } from './lens.mjs';
```

### IIFE (Immediately Invoked Function Expression)

```js
<script src="lens.js"></script>;
// ...
window.LensBundle.Lens;
```

## API

 We're hard at work on documentation and examples.

Head on over here to see the docs [here](https://evitcastudio.github.io/Lens/) until we're done.

### Global Dependency

Lens relies on the `VYLO` variable being globally accessible.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "lens",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "A powerful plugin that will allow you to attach a camera to your player and use its rich API for some cool effects.",
  "main": "dist/lens.min.mjs",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "build:rollup": "npx rollup -c --failAfterWarnings",
    "build:docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "build:dist": "npm run build:rollup && npm run build:docs"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "https://github.com/doubleactii",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE.md",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/EvitcaStudio/Lens.git"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@rollup/plugin-babel": "^6.0.4",
    "@rollup/plugin-terser": "^0.4.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "rollup": "^4.14.1",
    "rollup-plugin-banner2": "^1.2.3",
    "rollup-plugin-cleandir": "^2.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-replace": "^2.2.0"
  }
}
